name: Illusionist's Labyrinth
description:
DISCLAIMER!!! -- The game may take up to 2 minutes to load. PLEASE WAIT
Thank you.

INTRODUCTION

Enter a world where nothing is as it seems. An evil illusionist has trapped you in his labyrinth and you must escape! Fight against his horde of Spectral Undead to make your way back to... Reality?!

HOW TO PLAY

[Mouse] - Look
[WASD] - Move
[Shift] - Sprint
[Left-Click] - Attack
[Right-Click] - Block

CREDITS
